mapper.select: SELECT SNSNO, USERNO, USERNICK,PERMISSION ,CONTENT, LIKEY, PHOTOCOUNT, PHOTO_1,PHOTO_2,PHOTO_3,PHOTO_4, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WRITEDATE FROM SNS WHERE PERMISSION = 1 ORDER BY SNSNO DESC

SELECT SNSNO, USERNO, USERNICK,PERMISSION ,CONTENT, LIKEY, PHOTOCOUNT, PHOTO_1,PHOTO_2,PHOTO_3,PHOTO_4, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WRITEDATE FROM SNS WHERE (USERNO=#{loginNo} AND PERMISSION = 0) OR (PERMISSION = 1) OR (USERNO IN (SELECT FRIENDNO FROM FRIEND WHERE USERNO=#{loginNo} AND APPLY='N') AND PERMISSION = 0) ORDER BY SNSNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNS(SNSNO, USERNO, USERNICK,PERMISSION ,CONTENT, LIKEY, PHOTOCOUNT, PHOTO_1,PHOTO_2,PHOTO_3,PHOTO_4, WRITEDATE) VALUES (SNS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userNo},#{userNick}, #{permission}, #{content}, 0,#{photoCount}, #{photo_1},#{photo_2},#{photo_3},#{photo_4}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKELY WHERE USERNO=#{userNo} AND SNSNO=#{snsNo}
mapper.select: SELECT RPLYNO, SNSNO,USERNO, USERNICK ,CONTENT , PARENT_RPLY, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WRITEDATE FROM SNS_REPLY WHERE SNSNO = #{snsNo} ORDER BY RPLYNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNS_REPLY (RPLYNO, SNSNO,USERNO, USERNICK ,CONTENT , PARENT_RPLY, WRITEDATE) VALUES (SNS_RPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{snsNo}, #{userNo}, #{userNick} ,#{content}, #{parent_Rply}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO FRIEND(USERNO, FRIENDNO, APPLY) VALUES(#{userNo},#{friendNo},#{apply})
mapper.select: SELECT USERNO, FRIENDNO, APPLY FROM FRIEND WHERE FRIENDNO=#{userNo} AND APPLY='Y'
SELECT USERNO, FRIENDNO, APPLY FROM FRIEND WHERE USERNO=#{userNo} AND APPLY='D'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FRIEND WHERE USERNO=#{userNo} AND FRIENDNO=#{friendNo}
